titlestmt.titleproper: Bibliothèque nationale de France: Medieval Manuscript Photograph Collection
Bibliothèque nationale de France: Medieval Manuscript Photograph Collection
titlestmt.author: Compiled by Robert Carlucci

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Saturday December 8, 2018 at 00:18

did.unittitle: Bibliothèque nationale de France: Medieval Manuscript Photograph Collection
did.abstract: Gift of glass negatives and black and white unmounted photographs of medieval manuscripts in the Bibliotheque National, Paris. Rich, but not comprehensive, coverage. Assortment of full page illustrations and details, some duplicates. Known as the Tuefferd-Servant gift, acquired through Sumner McKnight Crosby.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright has not been transferred to Yale University. Further use of this material may be subject to the copyright laws of the United States (Title 17, United States Code) or to site license or other rights management terms or conditions.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Bibliothèque nationale de France: Medieval Manuscript Photograph Collection

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Gift of glass negatives and black and white unmounted photographs of medieval manuscripts in the Bibliotheque National, Paris. Rich, but not comprehensive, coverage. Assortment of full page illustrations and details, some duplicates. Known as the Tuefferd-Servant gift, acquired through Sumner McKnight Crosby.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Photographs in individual folders divided by manuscript labeled with title and shelf number. Glass negatives in original boxes as organized by donor.

did.unittitle: Manuscript Covers for Bib. Nat. Lat. 9455(?) and Bib. Nat. Lat. 17326, plus handwritten inventory of entire gift with some discrepancies (4 photographs)

Glass Negatives: Many negative numbers are available in printed format in boxes 1-6 of this collection
Glass negatives: Mss. Lat. 1, 2, 2196, 2290, 3024, 3027, 9474; Fr. 166, 22531, 22532, 23279, 24364, plus one box of unidentified negatives

Glass negatives: 3 boxes of negatives without identifying shelf numbers; Ms. Italien 115; Laon, Bib. Mun. MS. 550; Ms. all. 34, 106, 113, 222; Bib. Ars. Ms. 417, 638, 5064; Bib. Ste.-Genevieve, Ms. 1190
